forYou.title: Nothing here yet
forYou.description: Come back for notifications on events, streams, and more.

messages.title: You're all caught up!
messages.description: Open the Inbox by pressing CTRL+I, and mark your top message as read with CTRL+Shift+E.

mentions.title: You made it through everything!
mentions.description: Whenever someone mentions you it will be saved here for 7 days.
